name: Humped Back Wale
description:
Humped Back Wale! is a short horror game intended for speedrunning! simple mechanics, simple goal and a simple game but the fun part is hunting this game! Finding the best route, theorycrafting paths and discovering intentional bugs!

Humped Back Wale was created in one day on https://www.twitch.tv/duccw 


Controls:

WASD - move

E - interact

T - show/hide timer

Esc - reset

join the disccord to see wr runs and theorycrafting in action! discord link
